bug.author: myungjoo
bug.summary: [Decoder or Demo App] Residue of last result
bug.description:
With the first test/demo app of bounding-box decoder, when there is no objects to be detected, the last detection result is shown continuously. First, we need to find whether
it's a bug in the model. it's a bug in tensor_filter it's a bug in tensor_decoder it's inappropriate media stream pipeline configuration.

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/876>#876</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
Uh.. somehow there is no such issue anymore. I'm worried about the regression now, but let's move on.
